items.title: STAR Student
description: Joined May 2024
STAR Programme consists of 2 rotations separated by semester 1 of Third Year
Created production features in SAP Analytics Cloud
Second rotation on Core team in SAP Global Headquarters, Germany
Sole developer of product that is actively being integrated in to SAP Analytics Cloud
Designed and implemented multi-platform standard for creation of analytical dashboards

items.title: Sysadmin
description: Formerly Chairperson in 2023/24, and First Year Rep in 2022/23
Single-handedly restored technical infrastructure after 5-year gap
Collaborated with IT Department to secure 4 public IPv4 IP Addresses
Chief Architect on infrastructure and planning, sole developer on multiple projects

items.title: President
description: Former Grangegorman Chairperson 2023/24
Represented over 100 societies and 500 students at university and national levels
Returned student voices to society budgets in over 5 years
Made Societies Executive transparent and accountable
First President to promote cross-campus collaborations
Directly impacted the most amount of awards won by TU Dublin at national societies awards
Introduced User Group for the only student centre in flagship Grangegorman campus

items.title: Best Individual
description: Won for the most significant contribution to societies in the 2024/25 Academic Year
Contribution includes massively improved student voice, bringing all campuses together, and restoring the technical aspect of the Computer Science Society
Negotiated and worked with University staff to improve Student Life and Societies

items.title: National Champion
description: 25th - 27th of September in the RDS, Dublin
Sponsored by AWS
Three days of differing challenges from system architecture to cybersecurity
Placed first and will represent Ireland in EuroSkills 2025
Received Silver Medal from Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science
Received Award from WorldSkills and Amazon Web Services

items.title: University Champion
description: December 2022 in TU Dublin Blanchardstown
Team of 4 placed first out of 8 other teams
Challenges involved reverse engineering, web exploits, cryptography, and more
Won tickets to IRISSCON CTF 2022 and placed second against industry professionals

items.title: Team Member
description: October 2023 in Hamar, Norway
3-day competition with jeopardy-style and attack-defense challenges
Senior reserve for Team Ireland

items.title: Second Place Winner
description: August 2023 in Maldron Blue Hotel, Dublin
Team of 4 placed second out of 10 other teams
Challenges involved hacking baggage handling systems, air traffic control systems, drones, engine controllers, etc.
Won a cash prize

items.title: Competitor
description: November 2022 in TU Dublin Grangegorman
Team of 4 placed fourth out of 11 other teams
Designed a product which would minimise food waste in Ireland
Designed an app which would connect to supermarket apps and suggest recipes based on what was in the user's fridge

items.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
description: Earned June 2025
Demonstrates ability to design and deploy scalable systems on AWS

items.title: Amazon Web Services Developer - Associate
description: Earned September 2025
Demonstrates knowledge in lifecycle management, security, CI/CD and developing on AWS
